the Student News Site of University of Missouri  Kansas City

Eva Eva



For Eva Ramirez hearing her name called wasnt anything new PERIOD Except for this time when it was coming from her deceased mother PERIOD



Ramirez a vendor at a Da de los Muertos Day of the Dead celebration claimed to have heard this ghostly voice.. PERIOD

You know its October when nearly every event for the week is outside PERIOD This week is all about connecting with new people and new cultures right at home PERIOD I moved to Kansas City only two years ago and prior to that I could not have pointed to it on a map PERIOD Now I think it may.. PERIOD
